scripts.debug-docker: docker-compose up --detach postgres && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec 'node --inspect -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register src/index.ts'
scripts.prod-docker: docker-compose up --detach postgres && cross-env NODE_ENV=production nodemon --exec 'node --inspect -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register src/index.ts'
scripts.debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec 'node --inspect -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register src/index.ts'
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production nodemon --exec 'node --inspect -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register src/index.ts'
